00026 #ifdef __cplusplus
00027     /// \brief
00028     ///  GisGeometryType is an enumeration to denote the type of a Geometry.
00029     /// 
00030     /// \remarks
00031     ///  This enumeration applies to types that derive from GisIGeometry.
00032     /// 
00033     /// \param GisGeometryType_None 
00034     /// Indicates no specific type; used for "unknown", "don't care" or an incompletely constructed Geometry object.
00035     /// \param GisGeometryType_Point 
00036     /// Point type (GisIPoint).
00037     /// \param GisGeometryType_LineString 
00038     /// LineString type (GisILineString).
00039     /// \param GisGeometryType_Polygon 
00040     /// Polygon type (GisIPolygon).
00041     /// \param GisGeometryType_MultiPoint 
00042     /// MultiPoint type (GisIMultiPoint).
00043     /// \param GisGeometryType_MultiLineString 
00044     /// MultiLineString type (GisIMultiLineString).
00045     /// \param GisGeometryType_MultiPolygon 
00046     /// MultiPolygon type (GisIMultiPolygon).
00047     /// \param GisGeometryType_MultiGeometry 
00048     /// MultiGeometry type (GisIMultiGeometry).
00049     /// \param GisGeometryType_CurveString 
00050     /// CurveString type (GisICurveString).
00051     /// \param GisGeometryType_CurvePolygon 
00052     /// CurvePolygon type (GisICurvePolygon).
00053     /// \param GisGeometryType_MultiCurveString 
00054     /// MultiCurveString type (GisIMultiCurveString).
00055     /// \param GisGeometryType_MultiCurvePolygon 
00056     /// MultiCurvePolygon type (GisIMultiCurvePolygon).
00057     /// 
00058     enum GisGeometryType
00059 #else
00060     typedef enum
00061 #endif
00062 {
00063     GisGeometryType_None = 0,
00064 
00065     GisGeometryType_Point = 1,
00066 
00067     GisGeometryType_LineString = 2,
00068 
00069     GisGeometryType_Polygon = 3,
00070 
00071     GisGeometryType_MultiPoint = 4,
00072 
00073     GisGeometryType_MultiLineString = 5,
00074 
00075     GisGeometryType_MultiPolygon = 6,
00076 
00077     GisGeometryType_MultiGeometry = 7,
00078 
00079     GisGeometryType_CurveString = 10,
00080 
00081     GisGeometryType_CurvePolygon = 11,
00082 
00083     GisGeometryType_MultiCurveString = 12,
00084     
00085     GisGeometryType_MultiCurvePolygon = 13
00086 
00087 #ifdef __cplusplus
00088 };
00089 #else
00090 } GisGeometryType;
00091 #endif

00100     /// 
00101     /// \param GisGeometryComponentType_LinearRing 
00102     /// LinearRing type (GisILinearRing).
00103     /// \param GisGeometryComponentType_CircularArcSegment 
00104     /// CircularArcSegment type (GisICircularArcSegment).
00105     /// \param GisGeometryComponentType_LineStringSegment 
00106     /// LineStringSegment type (GisILineStringSegment).
00107     /// \param GisGeometryComponentType_Ring 
00108     /// Ring type (GisIRing).
00109     /// 
00110     enum GisGeometryComponentType
00111 #else
